subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Coaches and Managers
Football
lead_paragraph: A prominent figure in New Jersey athletics, Corcoran coached Parcells in high school basketball and then mentored him throughout Parcells’s N.F.L. coaching career.
snippet: A prominent figure in New Jersey athletics, Corcoran coached Parcells in high school basketball and then mentored him throughout Parcells’s N.F.L. coaching career.
